#include<iostream>
#define MAX 100
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,flag;
    char a[MAX],b[MAX];
    char k;
    //freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
    //freopen("output.txt","w",stdout);
    scanf("%d\n",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
              flag = 1;
              cin.getline(a,MAX);
              cin.getline(b,MAX);
              //cout << a << endl;
              //cout << b << endl;
              char *p=a,*z=a,*q=b,*y=b,*k;
              while(*p)
              {
              while(*p && *q && *p != *q)
                       p++;
              k = p;
              flag = 1;
              while(*q)
              {
                       p++;
                       if(!(*p))
                         p = z;
                       q++;
                       if(!(*q))
                          break;
                       if(*p != *q)
                       {
                          flag = 0;
                          break;
                       }
              }
              if(*q == '\0')
              {
                 cout << "YES" << endl;
                 break;
              }
              else
                 {
                      p = ++k;
                      q = y;
                 }
              }
              
              if(flag == 0)
                  cout << "NO" << endl;
    }
    //system("pause");
    return 0;
}
